OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

availableToAllocate(address).details: Kept in case you later add per-user limits/logic.

fund(uint256).details: Enforces that totalAllocated never exceeds proposedFund.

params._initialOwner: The EOA that will own/admin this clone.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

availableToAllocate(address).notice: Headroom for a specific user (currently same as global remaining).

canAllocate(uint256).notice: Whether a given amount could be allocated right now.

fund(uint256).notice: Allocate funds towards this proposal (tracked in contract state).

initialize(address,address,(string,uint2.notice: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

isFull().notice: Whether the cap has been fully reached.

remainingFund().notice: Remaining capacity before reaching the cap.

userdoc.notice: Implementation for Business Proposal with a hard fundraising cap.
